trans-unit.source: Provides a parent class for all three-dimensional transformations, including translation, rotation, and scale transformations.
trans-unit.target: 提供所有 3D 轉換的父類別，包括平移、旋轉和縮放轉換。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MatrixTransform3D> class to create transformations not available from the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.RotateTransform3D>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.TranslateTransform3D>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ScaleTransform3D> classes.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MatrixTransform3D>類別以建立未提供的轉換<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.RotateTransform3D>， <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.TranslateTransform3D>，和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ScaleTransform3D>類別。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3D" />, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: 建立這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3D" /> 的可修改複製品，深層複製這個物件的值。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 目前物件的可修改複本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property is <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property is <see langword="true." />
trans-unit.target: 即使來源的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性為 <see langword="true." />，複製物件的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性仍為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件)。

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 當複製相依性屬性時，這個方法會複製資源參考和資料繫結 （它們可能不能再解析），但不是動畫或它們目前的值。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3D" /> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: 建立這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3D" /> 物件的可修改複製品，製作這個物件目前值的深層複本。

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: 不會複製資源參考、資料繫結和動畫，但是會複製其目前值。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 目前物件的可修改複本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property is <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 即使來源的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性為 <see langword="false" />，複製物件的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性仍為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件)。

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the identity transformation.
trans-unit.target: 取得單位轉換。

trans-unit.source: Identity transformation.
trans-unit.target: 單位轉換。

trans-unit.source: The identity transformation has the effect of multiplying the object by the identity matrix.
trans-unit.target: 身分識別轉換效果相乘物件身分識別矩陣的乘積。

trans-unit.source: Gets the inverse transformation of this object, if possible.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個物件的反向轉換 (如果可能的話)。

trans-unit.source: An inverse of this instance, if possible; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果可能，則為這個執行個體的反向轉換，否則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3D.Inverse%2A> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3D.Inverse%2A> .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that specifies whether the matrix is affine.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，這個值指定矩陣是否為仿射。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the matrix is affine; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果矩陣為仿射，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: An affine transformation preserves collinearity.
trans-unit.target: 仿射轉換會保留共線性。

trans-unit.source: Transforms the specified object or array of objects.
trans-unit.target: 轉換指定的物件或物件陣列。

trans-unit.source: Point3D to transform.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的 Point3D。

trans-unit.source: Transforms the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" />.
trans-unit.target: 轉換指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" />。

trans-unit.source: Transformed Point3D.
trans-unit.target: 已轉換的 Point3D。

trans-unit.source: Array of Point3D objects to transform.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的 Point3D 物件陣列。

trans-unit.source: Transforms the specified array of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: 轉換 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> 物件的指定陣列。

trans-unit.source: Point4D to transform.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的 Point4D。

trans-unit.source: Transforms the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point4D" />.
trans-unit.target: 轉換指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point4D" />。

trans-unit.source: Transformed Point4D.
trans-unit.target: 已轉換的 Point4D。

trans-unit.source: Array of Point4D objects to transform.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的 Point4D 物件陣列。

trans-unit.source: Transforms the specified array of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point4D" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: 轉換 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point4D" /> 物件的指定陣列。

trans-unit.source: Vector3D to transform.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的 Vector3D。

trans-unit.source: Transforms the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" />.
trans-unit.target: 轉換指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" />。

trans-unit.source: Transformed Vector3D.
trans-unit.target: 已轉換的 Vector3D。

trans-unit.source: Array of Vector3D objects to transform.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的 Vector3D 物件陣列。

trans-unit.source: Transforms the specified array of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: 轉換 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> 物件的指定陣列。

trans-unit.source: The 3-D bounding box to transform.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的 3D 週框方塊。

trans-unit.source: Transforms the specified 3-D bounding box and returns an axis-aligned 3-D bounding box that is exactly large enough to contain it.
trans-unit.target: 轉換指定的 3D 週框方塊，並傳回剛好足夠包含該方塊的軸對齊 3D 週框方塊。

trans-unit.source: The smallest axis-aligned 3-D bounding box possible that contains the transformed <paramref name="rect" />.
trans-unit.target: 可能包含轉換之 <paramref name="rect" /> 的最小軸對齊 3D 週框方塊。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3D.TransformBounds%2A> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3D.TransformBounds%2A> .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。

trans-unit.source: The 3-D point to transform.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的 3D 點。

trans-unit.source: The result of transforming <c>inPoint</c>.
trans-unit.target: 轉換 <c>inPoint</c> 的結果。

trans-unit.source: Attempts to transform the specified 3-D point and returns a value that indicates whether the transformation was successful.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試轉換指定的 3D 點，並傳回表示轉換是否成功的值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="inPoint" /> was transformed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果已轉換 <paramref name="inPoint" /> 則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Unlike the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3D.Transform%2A> method, this method does not throw an exception if the transformation is unsuccessful.
trans-unit.target: 不同於<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3D.Transform%2A>方法，這個方法不會擲回例外狀況，如果轉換失敗。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3D.TryTransform%2A> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3D.TryTransform%2A> .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D" /> that represents the value of the current transformation.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D" />，它表示目前轉換的值。

trans-unit.source: Matrix3D that represents the value of the current transformation.
trans-unit.target: Matrix3D，表示目前轉換的值。
